title: Did Kenosha police give water to teenagers later on for double homicide?
subtitle: The police can hear on the speaker saying, "We appreciate you guys" during counter-protests after the police shot a black man in Kenosha.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The police in Kenosha, Wisconsin, gave water to Kyle Rittenhouse, a teenager who was later accused of killing two people and wounding a third person during protests against the police shooting of Jacob Blake, and said that they "appreciated" the anti-protesters.
